content: Shushrooshakkaaran: - baarekmor. Nalkappetta vishuddharahasyangall kaikkondathinte shesham veendum karunayulllla kartthaavinte mumpaake naam thala kunikkanam.
Janam :- nyangallude kartthaavum nyangallude daivavume, ninte thirumumpaake nyangall thala kunikkunnu.

Kaazhchayithil - kartthaave! Nin
Thiruvullllam - thushdippettu
Nalla mari-chor punyappe
Tteerayaraa-nandikkenam.

Yeshoo! Pithrsuthane! Nyangalle kaakkaname
Yeshoo! Mariyasuthaa! Nyangalle thunaykkaname
Yeshoo! Balappedutthi, Yeshu sookshikka
/tyeshoo! Doshiye nyangallil ninnakattaname
Yeshu! Akrthyavum - paapavum mochikka
Yeshoo! Vidhidivasam karuna thonnaname.

Maathaavu yaachikkum - parishuddhanmaarum
Naathhaa! Punyam nal-kingum - marichorkkum.
Pattakkaaran:- (padinyaarottu thirinyu rooshmaa cheythukond) vathsala sahodarangalle,....
Janam :- aammeen. Kartthaavu avidatthe kurbbaana amgeekarikkukayum avidatthe praarththhanakallaal nyangalle sahaayikkukayum cheyyumaa-raakatte.

Melppattakkaar pattakkaarodu shemmaashshanmaar
Erppaadaakki kartthaavivare bhoomiyithingkal
Aniyichaaravaranisham thannude sabhaye ivide
Anavaratham cheythetti vasikkum sthuthikallathaale.

Vinnin naayakanaam than naathharahasyangallathaayu
Mannin villavukall (pattakkaaran') kaazhchayanachu.
Thannude pakkalirangivaraanaayaathmaavine
Ninnu villicheedunnakame nal sharanatthaale.

Avane niyami-choraathmaavo-nissamshayamaay
aaghoshatthaa-lappam thannilirangi vasichu
Athine-gaathravu- makkaasaaye-rakthavumaakkum
Attahasichee-naam cholleeduka kuriyelaayisson,

1. Agnimayanmaar aare nokkil viracheedunnu
Avane meshayil appam veenyaayu nee kaanunnu
Aare minnaludutthor nokkukileriyunnudane
Avane manmayar bhakshichu mukham thelliyunnettam.

2. Erithee puthrarahasyangallaho vinnavaridayil
Eshaayaa thaan kandiva nammodu saakshikkunnu
Daivathvatthin madiyilirippu rahasyangalliva
Evam meshayil aadaamyarkkaayu bhaagikkunnu.

3. Kroobenmaarude therathu pole sthhiramee madbahaa
Svargatthin senakallundathine chuttikkondu
Daivasuthan thirumeniyathallo meshayilivide
Kaikallilaadaam makkalledutthaaghoshikkunnu.

4. Pattu dharichavanoppam ninniha vendunnorkkaayu
(pattakkaaran') maanikyangalle vithareedunnu
Vaanavaridayilasooyaadosham paadundengkil
Maanushasutharodaa kobenmaarkkundathu noonam.

5. Kurishippaanaayu suthane sehiyon naatti maratthe
Kunyaadathine janippichoru maramundaayavide
Evide puthran kaikallilaani tharaykkappettu
Isahaakkinte kettukalle chhedichathumavide.

6. Thannejamaanan than divyarahasyangalleyevam
Thaan kaikondu valamkaiyaale jeevanathaayi
Pangkittellaavarkkaayittum nalkeedunna
(pattakkaaraa!) vanniduka samaadhaanatthaale.

7. Amalamathaam dhoopatthin kalashatthe kaikkondu
Athinude nalloru saurabhyatthe dhoopippichi
Ttathinaalangane lokattheyaanandippikkum
(pattakkaaraa!) vanniduka samaadhaanatthaale

8 vaathsalyatthaal parishuddhaathmaavaam daivatthaal
Vallartthappettavanaayi, thannude naavathilennum
Daivatthin bhavanatthin thaakkolentunnavanaam
(pattakkaaraa!) vanniduka samaadhaanatthaale

9. Bhoomiyithingkal thannaaloruvan kettappettaal
Aa manujan vinnulakam thannil kartthaavaalum
Kettappettavanaamennulllloru (pattakkaaraa!)
Vanniduka samaa-dhaanatthaale. Kuriyelaayisson.

10. Aazhamathingkal thannaaloruvanazhikkappettaal
Aa manujan thaanuyaram thannil kartthaavaalum
Azhikkappettavanaamennulllloru (pattakkaaraa!)
Vanniduka samaa-dhaanatthaale. Kuriyelaayisson.

11. Undaakatte sthuthi kartthaavinu ningallude mel
Undaakatte than krpayennum punyamenikkum.
Undaakatte maar yaakkobaam malppaan thante
Ormmayathum nannaayundaakattellaayppozhum.

Than baliyaal paapikalle rakshichoru daivasuthaa
Nin baliyaalen kashdatha maaychan novozhikkaname.
Gogultthaayil than maarvvu thuranno-rutthamane
Daaham neekkittozhukiya neeraal chorayathaalum.

1. Ente kadangallashesham nin
Krpayaam esgaayathinaal
Maayichen paapangalleyum
Krpayaal punyamathaakkaname.

2. Rakshaka ninte rahasyangall
Shushrooshikkappettennaal
Athinaal punyappettavaro-
Denne yogyanathaakkaname

3. Kartthaave ninnude nithya-
Svargamathaayoru raajyatthil
Ninne shushrooshippaan nyaan
Ippozhumeppozhumennekkum.

4. Nithyasthuthi kartthaavinnum
Vidhidivasam krpa ningallilum
Nyaayaadhipathikkaardrathayi-
Ppaathakanilumundaakatte.

5. Krpayullllavanaam kartthaave,
Krpayenmelundaakaname
Krpayundaakuka, madiyanathaam
Enmel krpayundaakaname.

6. Ikkurbbaana anachullllo-
(rippattakkaaran) melum
Ee (shemmaashan) thanmelum
Orupol krpayundaakaname.

Moraan yeshumashihaa
1. Ullkkondoree nin meyyum - thirurakthamathum
Shikshaaprathikaarangallkkaayu
Theeraathe kuttangallaraa-nuthakeedaname
Nin valamathil nilkkunnathinum,
Haaleluyyaa - dhairyasametham.

Ninmodatthaazhvarayil kudippikkum neeyavare
2. Kartthaave! Nyangall bhakshi-chee nin meyyum
Vishvaasatthaal paanam cheytho-
Ruyirekum rakthamathum theenarakatthil
Paalamathaayu theernnekaname,
Haaleluyyaa jeevan nithyam.

3. Shishyarkkaayammaallikayil than - thirumeni
Khandichaadaamyarude
Rakshaykkum punyatthinumaayu - than rakthatthe
Kaasaa thannil chertthoru
Haaleluyyaa - suthanaayu sthothram.

4. Puthujeevan ninnodu kaikko-ndoraa kaikall
Avasaanadine vidhisamaya-
Tthareethiyin rookshathayingkal - nyetteedalle,
Nin shaithyam kondava thaane
Haaleluyyaa - neettappedane.

5. Gogultthaayil rakshakanaa-vrkshatthinmel
Vachangu marichor
Neduveerppin shabdam kettittillaki, paathaallatthil
Chennavarude nukamathozhichu,
Haaleluyyaa modippichu.

Paathakanaam roobelinu - jeevan moosha
Mrgabaliyaal nalki-yengkil
Jeevanezhum nin baliyaale
Vishvaasikallaayu marichorkka-
Ngethra gunam koodum.

Nyangallude kartthaave! Nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Krpayundaayi nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Uttharamaru llicheythu nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Ennekkum nyangallude sharanavume ninakku sthuthi.
